rows.label: tlk47500163_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I've been hearing worrying things lately.
Liberalitas's far removed from the world
at large, but anything could happen...

rows.label: tlk47500163_02_msg0002
rows.name:
All these old bones can do is pray to
the Village Guardian and our ancestors
to give our kids a brighter tomorrow...

rows.label: tlk47500163_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Rex? Don't waste your life in vain, do
you hear? For Correl, and for your
parents.
